title: Notable Two Hundred Day Moving Average Cross - CIEN - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, shares of Ciena Corp (Symbol: CIEN) crossed below their 200 day moving average of $38.67, changing hands as low as $37.94 per share. Ciena Corp shares are currently trading off about 6.3% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of CIEN shares, versus its 200 day moving average:
